etomica.potential

Class EwaldSumMolecules

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.EwaldSumMolecules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPotential, IPotentialMolecular

    public class EwaldSumMolecules
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPotentialMolecular
    basic Ewald Sum U(coulomb) = U(real-space) + U(fourier-space) + U(self-correction) Frenkel&Smit, p292-300.especially equation(12.1.25) also Allen, computer simulation of liquids Ch5
